column4: A disordered stack of papers with a strange sequence of numbers on one of the pages...
A finely crafted plasma pistol. It hums and vibrates very subtly.
It is difficult to tell what this strange device is exactly... It almost looks like a flashlight–But its grip is angled and it emits a strange noise when turned on.
A very heavy vest for its thinness–Perhaps it can be of use despite its seeming fragility.
